alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FRANKLIN, WESTERN FAIRFIELD, SOUTHWESTERN HOCKING, PICKAWAY, SOUTHWESTERN LICKING AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Grove City to near Bainbridge, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Lancaster, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Gahanna, Chillicothe, Pickerington, Circleville, Bexley, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Baltimore, South Bloomfield, Kingston, Williamsport, Beechwood Trails, Logan Elm Village and North Folk Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross
